text: @SenSchumer Our President of the United States of America actually LOVES US & this beautiful country and has given everything for it! 🇺🇸 Plus he’s our only leader that suggested a protocol for Covid-19 that Worked while BIG PHARMA SLAVES remained silent! Trumps actions speak loud and we hear
